title: Galaxy Introduction
description: Start here if you are new to Galaxy

intro.title: Some Background about the Galaxy Project
intro.description:
These webinars and videos provide some information about the Galaxy project
and the community.

tutorials.title: Let's get started!
tutorials.description: Start here if you just want to get started learning Galaxy!

history.title: The New Galaxy History
history.description: The Galaxy History has recently been updated, this means your Galaxy may look different than what you see in the tutorial videos. This short demo video walks you through the basics of the new Galaxy history system.
